sync: What is this? Such shabby stone DARES to get IN MY LAIR?!
But wait… You have a pretty scarf and it GLOWS! … HahaHa-! I like it, IT SHOULD BE MINE AND YOUR GRAVEL WILL DECORATES MY WALLS…!
EEK-! Wh- why does the Ursa monster wake up??? I’m not even that noisy…!?
Uh- uh- I think it’s my cue to run, NOW!
